titles.title: National Response Framework Improvement Act of 2020
National Response Framework Improvement Act of 2020
National Response Framework Improvement Act of 2020
A bill to require the Federal Emergency Management Agency to evaluate the National Response Framework based on lessons learned from the COVID-19 pandemic, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 116-318.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 621.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care
